resources.string:
This application restores a backup made by the JW fork of Signal for a fresh installation on a new device. Titanium Backup will not do it after version 4.16.0 on Android 6 or hihger because the database encryption key is stored in a location inaccessible to Titanium Backup.

 Please restore the SignalExport and SignalSecrets directories on the internal storage before running this program.

 Install this application before Signal, restore the backup and install Signal on top of it. Do not deinstall this application first.

 If you get signature errors with the original Signal app, please use Lucky Patcher or the Xposed module Xinstaller to allow installing applications with a different signature.

 Software created by Johan Wevers (johanw@xs4all.nl).
 http://www.xs4all.nl/~johanw/index.html
Signal Backup Importer does not have access to the internal SD card. Please adjust the permissions in Settings - Permissions..
General IO exception when importing backup.
General IO exception when exporting backup.
Restoring an encrypted backup will completely replace your existing keys, preferences, and messages. You will lose any information that\'s in your current Signal install but not in the backup.
This will export your encrypted keys, settings, and messages to the SD card.
Exporting encrypted keys, settings, and messages...
Error, unable to write to storage.
